message.content: cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE. The paper discusses the use of deep learning for real-time question answering in an MOOC, specifically in the context of a robotics competition. The use of contextual embedding mechanisms such as BERT and the development of a weighted similarity metric suggest a focus on natural language processing and machine learning, which are covered in the arXiv sub-categories of cs.CL, cs.AI, and cs.LG. The use of the discussion forum and the need for real-time responses suggest a focus on information retrieval and search, which are covered in the arXiv sub-categories of cs.IR and cs.NE.
